name: Hekopino
description:
Max - the MC, wakes up not remembering anything in a strange land. After waking up he meets Greg - a beast man, that is hunter. Greg welcomes him and tells Max a way to village and asks to meet him there. And this is this how this story starts...

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hello pietru here. With Hekopino I hope I can make a game in which has intresting story, but also part of the story is found by exploring (rather still small) world of Hekoponia.

Game is planed to have 7 village characters + some not decided enemy characters.
Curently there are 3/7 village characters.
Village Hunter, Village Head and Innovator.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This Game Day night cycle is synchronised to pc clock. Example when it is XX:X0 it will be sunny (day) when you enter game but XX:X5 would be dark (night). Full 1 day is 10 minutes long.

I rl have high hopes for this project.
